summary: Hair textures and normal maps tweaked for realism
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#88ff00]Check out my new survival PVP project [/color][url=https://www.armyrust.com][color=#88ff00]ARMYRUST[/color][/url]

[heading][font=verdana]DESCRIPTION[/heading]
Hair textures and normal maps tweaked for realism
In general hair is now softer, darker, less washed-out looking and less shiny with reduced streaks (more uniform colouration). I'm workin on the assumption tht they dont have steady access to pantenne pro v in tamriel lol.
Also, old people should have much more obvious old person hair!
No performance impact

[b]If you are looking for a hair replacer that is not based on vanilla, I strongly suggest [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4307/?]AoF Believable Hair[/url], there is no better hair replacement mod out there![/b] It's what I use :)

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/3397-2-1323714395.jpg[/img]

[heading]INSTALLATION[/heading]
Unpack .rar contents to Data
